definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: All this above imputes or contributes to the communication su ort.
sentences.chinese: 以上这些都可以归罪于或归功于通信保障。

sentences.english: I have no aspirations such as those you impute to me.
sentences.chinese: 我可没有你归罪于我的这些欲望。

sentences.english: Londoncannot claim credit for having produced all of the whipping-boys of the financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 不能归罪伦敦给金融危机带来这么多带罪羔羊。

sentences.english: He blamed the evils of market competition.
sentences.chinese: 他把这归罪于市场竞争这个魔鬼。

sentences.english: But the pure behavior imputation also has the various insufficiency and the flaw.
sentences.chinese: 但是单纯的行为归罪亦有多方面的不足和缺陷。

sentences.english: He had no hesitation in imputing the failure of his marriage to his wife's shortcomings.
sentences.chinese: 他毫不犹豫地将他婚姻的失败归罪于他妻子的缺点。

sentences.english: The government blames middle men who collect milk from dairy farmers.
sentences.chinese: 政府归罪于从奶牛养殖者手中收购牛奶的中间商。

sentences.english: The heatwave has been blamed on masses of hot air from the Sahara Desert moving north.
sentences.chinese: 这场热浪归罪于从撒哈拉沙漠向北袭来的大量热空气。

sentences.english: Germans far more likely to blame cars and aircraft use for global warming.
sentences.chinese: 德国人更倾向于把全球变暖归罪于汽车和飞机的使用。

sentences.english: But Zhu did not trace all of China’s troubles to foreign invaders.
sentences.chinese: 但是朱先生没有把中国所有的苦难归罪于侵略者。

sentences.english: Series of attacks blamed on people with grievances, mental illness
sentences.chinese: 一连串的截击归罪于具有不满情绪和心理疾病的人。

sentences.english: Now Andy, just take it easy. I'm not saying you are to blame for everything .
sentences.chinese: 安狄，别激动，我并没有说所有的问题都归罪于你。

sentences.english: They later blamed their experience on the crime culture of the favellas.
sentences.chinese: 事后他们把遭遇归罪于这个贫民区的犯罪文化。

sentences.english: How dare you impute such monstrous intentions to me?
sentences.chinese: 我可没有你归罪于我的这些欲望。

sentences.english: He thought of inculpating his brother to escape punishment himself.
sentences.chinese: 他想归罪于他的兄弟以避免自己受罚。

sentences.english: But to blame the service for infidelity is to confuse cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 但将夫妻不忠归罪在线约会则是本末倒置了。

definition: to put the blame on/to accuse
to avoid (esp. responsibility)/to shift (the blame)/to pass the buck
to take one's anger out on sb (who does not deserve it)
to vent one's anger on an innocent party (idiom)
to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to target sb or sth (for attack, criticism etc)
to shield (a miscreant) from punishment, criticism etc/to take sb's side
